title: Long queue times (20min~45min)
body:
Username: Xooase
Level 27

Consistently long queue time, for Normal Blind Pick, premade Normal Blind Pick (with 1 other friend) and ARAM. 
For example, this morning at 9:20 am. 

I tried turning off my router and then turning it back on, but had no luck. 

Please help or give suggestions...

replies.body:
Same situation here. Been that way for a month or so. I often have to give up because of time pressures. Quiting the queue and restarting sometimes seems to work but that may just be confirmation bias. I heard that the way they group ppl may be the issue but who knows. Riots communication on issues is not great in my experience.

Welcome to the new cruelty.
